title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) This Part
provides information regarding the procedures by which members of the public
may assert rights granted by the Personal Privacy Protection Law. (b) The authority shall maintain in its
records only personal information relevant and necessary to accomplish purposes
required by statute or executive order, or to implement a program specifically
authorized by law. (c) Personal
information will be collected, whenever practicable, directly from the person
to whom the information pertains. (d) The authority will seek to ensure that
all records are accurate, relevant, timely and complete. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9001.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
